name: Soccer
overview:
You've got to be fast on your feet to keep up with Nintendo SOCCER!

Enjoy World Cup action as you move your team up and down the field to victory! Perform Kickoffs, Throw-ins, Goal kicks and Corner kicks just like in a real soccer match. You can choose a computer team or a friend as your opponent. Then select a skill level 1-5. Youll love Nintendo's state-of-the-art graphics and realistic game play, and of course, the head-to-head competition that youll control just with your fingertips! If you miss out on this exciting Nintendo game pak, youll be kicking yourself!
